title: Shopping Website
description: Shopping Website that requests login, sign-up, and has page protection while communicating with backend server via an API.

title: Shopping Website Server
description: Developed backend and API to communicate with the frontend. Handels authentication, sign-up, and host website product information.

title: Disaster Victim Management Application
description: Terminal based application to assist social workers in handeling victims of a disaster. App communicates with database to keep track of different victims, locations, supplies, inquiries, etc.
